name: Vibrant Bible
short_description: At one time many developers hosted their work on sites like Multiupload and Megaupload. As you know, these sites were seized by the FBI in early 2012, thus destroying all hosted material; both good and bad. This caused a lot of older ROMs, kernels, and even a script or two to disappear with it. During the making of the Vibrant Bible thread I discovered that even some of most popular ROMs had been hosted solely on Megaupload or Multiupload, and threads were now littered with dead download links as a result. So I went on a quest to hunt down these files. Some I had backed up on my own computer, some I was able to find with some in-depth googling, and for others I had to reach out to the community to find a copy. Once a missing file was obtained, I uploaded it here, where they will be hosted indefinitely.
summary: Repository of Files Mentioned in the Vibrant Bible.
